name: Trivia Quiz Shell Program File
summary: A TQS file is a program file created by Trivia Quiz Shell, a freeware application used by teachers and students to facilitate learning and test knowledge. It contains a learning program built by a user and is saved in XML format. TQS files may include multiple choice questions, true-false questions, fill-in-the-blank questions, hangman games, menus, embedded images, and sounds.
